title: Show HN: Instant Messaging-Based (SMS/WhatsApp) Accountability on a Blockchain
text:
I would love to get your ideas and suggestions about where ReliablyME could be most valuable, as we are still in product-market fit discovery mode.

ReliablyME is an accountability and behavioural credentialing utility on a blockchain that employs a gamified commitments-based nudging approach to affect behavioural outcomes (academically proven to be the most cost-effective way to affect behaviour change). We use gamified 2-way any-to-any instant messaging (SMS/WhatsApp) to instantly engage the broadest population demographic (no Internet, no smartphone, no app downloads and installations).

See: - Sample Use Cases at https://reliablyme.com/reliablyme-platform/use-cases/

It supports numerous applications (analogous to a spreadsheet) directly or through API integrations, including:

- Education, training (lifelong experiential learning) - Health and wellness (help keep people healthy at home and out of the hospital) - Workforce development (equitable access to employment) - Corporate CSR/ESG and brand activation (campaign sponsorship and employee engagement) - Municipal/community citizen engagement (access and empowerment for all citizens)

Try it by sending me the following offer (or any other Offer/Invitation to anyone else):

"I will try ReliablyME and provide you with constructive feedback."

It gives you an opportunity to earn a HELPING HAND digital badge for your ReliablyME Commitment Portfolio.

Engage with the ReliablyME chatbot by messaging "Hi" to WhatsApp +16474904903 (easier to use this link: https://wa.me/+16474904903) or texting “Hi” to SMS 8312906400 US Pacific; 3215944485 US Eastern; 6475609919 in Canada.

Learn more at http://app.reliably.me/faq and demonstration video at https://youtu.be/9pewpGp2N_A

Show HN: IPDetective bots using IP address
text:
IPDetective collects data from about 60+ different sources such as official cloud provider endpoints and public VPN/Proxy/Tor/Bot net lists. Then aggregates this data into a fast and easy to use API that can be integrated into applications or scripts easily.

IPDetective started as a hobby project for my other hobby projects :) and I decided to wrap a simple website around and offer it as a service.

Let me know what your thoughts, if you find value in this service or if you have any feature requests.
